participant_1.background:
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
i am in a rock band.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.
I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking.

participant_2.background:
I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin.
I'm interested in learning more about how to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy growing organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I also like to grow my own food. I have a small herb garden in my backyard.
That's great! I have a small garden in my backyard as well. I grow a variety of vegetables, including tomatoes, cucumbers, and peppers.
What's your favorite vegetable to grow?
I love growing tomatoes! They're so easy to grow and they taste amazing when they're fresh from the garden.
I agree! Tomatoes are my favorite vegetable to grow as well. They're so delicious and versatile.
I also love growing cucumbers. They're so refreshing on a hot summer day.
I love cucumbers too! They're great in salads, sandwiches, and on their own.
I'm glad we agree! Cucumbers are the best vegetable.
They're definitely up there! What's your favorite way to eat tomatoes?
I love to eat them fresh, in salads, or on sandwiches.
I love them all of those ways too! I also love to make tomato sauce with them.
Tomato sauce is so good! I love to make it with fresh tomatoes from my garden.
Me too! It's the best way to enjoy fresh tomatoes.
